item.title: STALKER 2: 7 Best Early Game Guns, Ranked
item.description:
Key Takeaways

  • Skif Pistol is a valuable backup weapon for early-game challenges
  • Boomstick offers high damage with little ammo, great for mutants
  • AKM-74U provides versatility and efficiency for facing early-game obstacles

One of the most important aspects in the inventory of any Stalker wishing to explore the dangers of The Zone is the arsenal of weapons chosen. Although options are scarce in the early hours of the game, the hostile environment of STALKER 2 still offers different equipment that can make the beginning of the journey easier.

Therefore, the best weapons for the early game of STALKER 2 are those that can be found in missions or loot during missions and have attributes that make a difference in a firefight. Thus, players who desire a strong start in the game should consider some of these options as the protagonist's main equipment.

7 Skif Pistol

Can Save The Character In Crucial Moments

  • Caliber: 9x18
  • Magazine: 8

Being the initial equipment that the character has after finishing the prologue of the story, the Makarov Pistol that Skif, the protagonist, possesses is not designed to be the main option, but it is still one of the best early game guns in STALKER 2 . This is because, considering the scarce resources at the beginning, it is quite useful.

It does not weigh down the inventory and cannot be sold, so players can explore The Zone with it equipped and have a last option in case the other guns run out of ammo or are broken. In some more critical situations, the Skif Pistol is an excellent backup weapon and also an economical gun to carry.

6 Boomstick

High Damage For Little Ammo

  • Caliber: 9x18
  • Magazine: 8

Although it requires exposing oneself to enemies to attack them, unlike other guns, shotguns are capable of dealing significant damage and ending a fight quickly. Therefore, the Boomstick is an excellent option for a novice Stalker in The Zone, being able to handle especially the mutants that inhabit the area.

Shotgun ammunition is also an abundant resource in The Zone and can be easily found by looting containers and defeating enemies, although in this situation, equipment will usually not be in the best condition. It is also possible to purchase it from vendors relatively cheaply.

5 AKM-74U

An Option That Can Be A Lifesaver In The Game

  • Caliber: 5.45x39
  • Magazine: 30

The AKM-74U is a versatile and efficient weapon for the early game in STALKER 2 . Its combination of power and handling makes it easier to face the initial challenges in The Zone, mainly because it has an excellent rate of fire, allowing players to deal with enemies quickly during the game's combats.

It is also relatively easy to find the AKM-74U throughout the game, as it can be easily acquired in specialized shops or found on the bodies of defeated enemies as part of the loot. Although it has a higher rate of fire than the AKM-74S, its accuracy is lower, requiring good recoil control to maximize its effectiveness in combat.

4 M860 Cracker

A Powerful Pump-Action Shotgun For The Early Game

  • Caliber: 12"/70
  • Magazine: 6

The M860 Cracker is a powerful pump-action shotgun and one of the best options for the early game in STALKER 2 . Superior to the Sawed-Off shotguns found on most bandits, it offers greater reliability and damage, being extremely useful also for combating mutants that usually tank a lot of damage from enemies.

Despite being an excellent option for the beginning of the game, players still need to complete some missions to obtain it, as it is not available from Hamster in Zalissya. Thus, heading to Huron in Slag Heap is necessary to acquire this powerful gun.

3 Viper-5

A Favorite Option Among Many Stalkers

  • Caliber: 9x19
  • Magazine: 30

One of the most abundant weapons in the early game of STALKER 2 is the Viper-5, which can be found in loots, enemies, or even in some missions, making it an excellent option for the first hours. The map is filled with ammunition to be used with it, in addition to having a magazine of 30 rounds, making it strong equipment.

Moreover, considering that the game has a system where weapons deteriorate over time, the Viper-5 has a relatively low cost to repair, but given the number of options that exist throughout the map, it is easier to simply find a new one in the loots. Another advantage is stability, as its recoil is not usually as strong as that of other guns.

2 TOZ-34

The Best Shotgun For The Start Of The Journey

  • Caliber: 12"/70
  • Magazine: 2

Shotguns are simple weapons to use and deal a lot of damage, so Stalkers venturing through The Zone need to have one of these in their inventory, even if only as a secondary option. In this context, for the early game of STALKER 2 , the best option is the TOZ-34.

Compared to the Boomsticks that players find more easily, this shotgun has better accuracy, being a perfect option for combats that happen in closed environments. It is possible to buy it at Hamster's shop in Zalissya or on the body of a fallen Stalker during the secondary mission The Lost Boys.

1 Valik Lummox's AKM-74S

A Reliable Gun For The Early Game Of STALKER 2

  • Caliber: 9x19
  • Magazine: 30

While trying to survive The Zone, it is important that the Stalker can hit as many enemies as possible and stay in a safe position. Therefore, having a weapon that can aim at long-distance targets is fundamental, making the AKM-74S one of the best early-game guns in STALKER 2 .

There are different ways to obtain this equipment, but the easiest is to do the first mission for Warlock, as it is possible to find one at the top of the Water Tower during the secondary quest. In addition to having a scope that provides extra range, the gun also has a fast reload time, making it one of the best options at the beginning of the game.

item.title: Genshin Impact Leaks Full Track List for New Rhythm Game Mode
item.description:
Key Takeaways

  • Genshin Impact is adding a permanent rhythm event in Version 5.3 with a total of 56 tracks.
  • The tracks appear to be pulled from the first five regions of Genshin Impact, presumably leaving Natlan for a future update.
  • Version 5.3 is expected to launch on January 1, 2025.

Genshin Impact is adding a permanent rhythm event in Version 5.3, and thanks to a recent leak, players can see the full track list available at launch. At its core, Genshin Impact is an open world adventure, where players can pull for their favorite characters and use them to build powerful teams. However, the developers have never shied away from offering alternative game modes that aren't focused on combat, the most notable examples being Genius Invokation TCG and the Serenitea Pot.

While the Rhythm event has had many incarnations throughout Genshin Impact 's history (recently returning in Version 4.6), it became popular enough for the developers to consider adding a permanent game mode. Among other quality-of-life features coming to Genshin Impact in Version 5.3, the permanent Rhythm event will also be added, complete with an accompanying store, as well as a way for players to share their own tracks.

According to MadCroiX, Genshin Impact will feature a grand total of 56 tracks in the initial version of the event, which will bear the name "Repertoire of Myriad Melodies." The assortment of tracks appears to be pulled from the first five regions of Genshin Impact , presumably leaving Natlan for a future update. It features both general tracks such as "The Hustle and Bustle of Ormos" and theme songs dedicated to specific Genshin Impact characters.

Genshin Impact: Repertoire of Myriad Melodies Track List

Mondstadt

  • Bustling Afternoon in Mondstadt
  • Invitation of Windblume
  • Bard's Adventure – Venti
  • Let's Go, Crimson Knight! - Klee Contemplation in Snow – Albedo
  • Dance of Aphros – Eula
  • Sieh an, mein Sommernachtgarten! – Fischl
  • Exclusive Specialty – Diona
  • Symphony of Boreal Wind
  • Caelestinum Finale Termini
  • An Interesting Labour
  • Photon of Fluctuation

Liyue

  • Moon in One's Cup
  • Rapid as Wildfires
  • Path of Yaksha – Xiao
  • Qilin's Prance – Ganyu
  • Rex Incognito – Zhongli
  • Any Last Words? – Hu Tao
  • Chapter of a New Era – Yun Jin
  • The Crane Cries – Shenhe
  • Rage Beneath the Mountains
  • Wrath of Monoceros Caeli – Tartaglia
  • Devastation and Redemption – Yun Jin

Inazuma

  • Duel in the Mist
  • Drifter's Destiny – Kazuha
  • Blossoms of Summer Night – Yoimiya
  • Devotion of the Keeper – Thoma
  • Termination of Desires – Raiden Shogun
  • Time to Shine – Arataki Itto
  • Nothing but Trickery – Yae Miko
  • Storm Chaser – Shikanoin Heizou
  • No Turning Back
  • Saltatio Favillae
  • The Almighty Violet Thunder – Raiden Shogun

Sumeru

  • Hustle and Bustle of Ormos
  • Gilded Runner
  • Melody of Distant Green Fields
  • Caprice of the Leaves – Collei
  • Winding Through Avidya – Tighnari
  • Surasthana Fantasia – Nahida
  • Cogitation of Epochs – Alhaitham
  • Order of Silence – Cyno
  • Whirling of Vairambhaka – Faruzan
  • Polumnia Omnia – The Balladeer
  • God-Devouring Mania

Fontaine

  • Rondeau des fleurs et des rapieres
  • Lamentation et Triomphe
  • Lustrous Trick – Lyney
  • Nippy Bout – Wriothesley
  • Parousia Diluvi – Neuvillette
  • Se mettre sur son trente-et-un! – Furina
  • Ode to Unbegun Offerings – Arlecchino
  • Shining Sails and Painted Parasols – Navia
  • Absolutio Absoluta Absolutissime – Arlecchino
  • Silhouette of Catastrophe
  • La vaguelette – Furina

Current footage from the beta implies that the tracks can be played at any time, and due to the permanency of the new Rhythm event, players won't need to worry about the game mode disappearing after a week or two. While it remains to be seen if the developers will continue to support the new game mode in a similar vein to Genius Invokation TCG in Genshin Impact , the initial track list will no doubt keep players busy for a while.

It also remains to be seen what this means for future Genshin Impact Flagship Events that are centered around Rhythm gameplay, as the Repertoire of Myriad Melodies could make them all redundant. That being said, Genius Invokation TCG had its own dedicated event in Version 3.7, which means that the developers may still find a way to feature Rhythm events on top of the Repertoire. At the very least, Genshin Impact players should expect to see Natlan tracks added to the Repertoire of Myriad Melodies once more characters from the region join the main cast. Version 5.3 is expected to launch on January 1, 2025.

item.title: December 4 is Going to Be a Big Day for Honkai: Star Rail Fans
item.description:
Key Takeaways

  • Honkai: Star Rail Version 2.7 will be released on December 4, concluding the story in Penacony.
  • The update will introduce new five-star characters, a Party Car, cosmetics, and challenges.
  • Version 3.0 is already in preparation for 2025, featuring new characters like Herta and Aglaea.

HoYoverse has recently announced that Honkai: Star Rail ’s Version 2.7 will be available on December 4. The update will be the final chapter of Honkai: Star Rail ’s story in Penacony before the Astral Express moves to a new region, and it’s being eagerly awaited by the fanbase.

Released in 2023, Honkai: Star Rail was a major hit. The game was downloaded over 20 million times in a single day after launch, and it obtained positive reviews from most critics. Several updates later, Honkai: Star Rail is still greatly popular, as websites such as Activeplayer.io indicate that the game has maintained more than 19 million players over the past month.

Now, HoYoverse has revealed that the eagerly awaited Version 2.7 of Honkai: Star Rail will be live on December 4. This new chapter will bring more of the storyline set in Penacony, finishing the story in the region before the Astral Express moves towards the new realm of Amphoreus, the Eternal Land. According to the developers, the update will introduce two new playable five-star characters: Sunday and Fugue. Also, gamers will also have the chance to obtain both Jin Yuan and Firefly, two five-star characters that appeared in previous runs.

Honkai: Star Rail's Version 2.7 Will Be Released on December 4

Along with the characters and more of the main story, Version 2.7 will bring a new Party Car to the Astral Express, with a new room for the Trailblazer, new cosmetics, and challenges. Unfortunately, the complete patch notes for the new update have not been revealed yet, but it’s expected that it will bring major changes to the game.

While fans are already excited for Version 2.7, Honkai: Star Rail is already preparing for Version 3.0. HoYoverse has recently revealed two characters that will appear in the first update of 2025, which is expected to go live on January 15. One of the upcoming Honkai: Star Rail characters is Herta, an Ice-type Erudition character that resides in Amphoreus.

The other major upcoming five-star character of Honkai: Star Rail 's Version 3.0 is Aglaea, who is noteworthy for being the first Path of Remembrance character in the game. Reports indicate that Aglaea is a five-star Lighting-type character and that she’s the Dressmaster of Okhema and one of Amphoreus' Chrysos Heirs. In any case, gamers will have plenty to do in Version 2.7 with the new Sunday and Fugue characters before they can explore Amphoreus and its new characters in the upcoming update.

item.title: Monopoly GO: Space Sprouts Rewards And Milestones
item.description:
Quick Links

  • Space Sprouts Monopoly GO Rewards And Milestones
  • Space Sprouts Monopoly GO Rewards Summary
  • How To Get Points In Space Sprouts Monopoly GO

The two-day Galactic Getaway event has come to an end, and now it's time for another out-of-the-world adventure with the Space Sprouts event. It begins on Nov 22 and will be available for two days until Nov 24 .

The Space Sprouts Monopoly GO event comes with many exciting rewards for participants. Whether you are looking for dice or want to complete your Marvel GO sticker set, it has something for everyone. In addition to standard rewards, you'll have a chance to win many Raygun tokens for the Treasures of the Galaxy minigame. Ready to see all the rewards up for grabs? Here's everything available in the Space Sprouts Monopoly GO event.

Space Sprouts Monopoly GO Rewards Summary

The rewards in the Space Sprouts Monopoly GO event are pretty awesome. With 50 milestones , you’ll get 50 rewards, including dice, stickers, and more. Check out what you can earn at each milestone below:

  • 17,940 Dice
  • 189 Raygun Tokens for Treasures of the Galaxy
  • Top Reward of 7,500 Dice and a Purple Sticker Pack
  • Three Purple Sticker Packs (45th, 48th, and 50th Milestones)
  • Two Blue Sticker Packs (30 and 39th Milestones).

Space Sprouts Monopoly GO is only here for two days and five hours, so you’ll want to jump in right away to gather everything you can.

How To Get Points In Space Sprouts Monopoly GO

Getting points in the Space Sprouts event is simple. All you need to do is land your token on your board's Chance, Utility, and Tax Tiles to earn points. Here's what these squares offer at 1x multiplier:

  • Chance: Two Points
  • Utility: Two Points
  • Tax Tile: Three Points.

If you have plenty of dice, try to crank up your multiplier whenever you can to rack up points faster for the Space Sprouts Monopoly GO event. And yes, don’t forget to aim for the Railroads to make progress in the Cosmo Clash tournament while you’re at it.

item.title: Homeworld 3 - Somtaaw and Taiidan Release Trailer
item.description: Sci-fi RTS game Homeworld 3 launches its final content update, Somtaaw and Taiidan, on November 22, 2024, include a complete rebalancing of combat. Homeworld 3 launched in May 2024, and its final content update provides its biggest changes to multiplayer ever.
